Ingredients.3: 0.5 pound chicken livers, rinsed and trimmed

Ingredients.5: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or more as needed

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Grease a 9-inch square baking dish and line it with parchment paper.

Directions.2: Add oats to the bowl of a food processor; pulse until finely chopped, 10 to 15 seconds. Transfer oats to a large bowl and mix in flour.

Directions.3: Place livers in the food processor and process until smooth, 10 to 15 seconds. Add eggs and blend until well combined, about 10 seconds. Add oil and process until incorporated.

Directions.4: Add liver mixture to oat and flour mixture; stir until well blended. Spoon into the prepared baking dish.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven until firm to the touch but not hard and crispy, 30 to 40 minutes.

Directions.6: Remove from the oven and let cool completely before cutting into 50 pieces.
